channel.title: Zarvality - Instant Pking | All Skills | Construction | Achievements | Quests
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/qys612.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.zarvality.com/toplists/play.gif[/img][B][U][SIZE=3][URL=http://www.zarvality.com]Join Now![/URL][/SIZE][/U][/B][/CENTER]
[B][U][SIZE=3]Introduction:[/SIZE][/U][/B]
Zarvality is a Runescape Private Server that inspires a variety of people to play due to the daily updates, exciting content and friendly staff team. Players of all different ages and backgrounds have the opportunity to fit in nicely with the community and help Zarvality reach the very top.
[B][U][SIZE=3]Social Media Links:[/U][/B]
[IMG]http://www.zarvality.com/toplists/youtube.png[/img][B][U][SIZE=3][URL=http://www.youtube.com/zarvality] Youtube[/URL] [IMG]http://www.zarvality.com/toplists/facebook.png[/img][URL=http://www.facebook.com/zarvality] Facebook[/URL] [IMG]http://www.zarvality.com/toplists/twitter.png[/img][URL=http://www.twitter.com/zarvality] Twitter[/URL][/SIZE][/U][/B]
[B][U][SIZE=3]Our Best Features:[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[ul][*] Choose XP Rates - On login, you're able to choose a ranking. The Pker ranking allows you to set any combat skills to your desired level. Alternatively, you can choose Hard, Medium or Easy XP rates. [*] Instant Pking - As mentioned above, you're able to set your ranking to a Pker. This allows you to PK quickly due to the set leveling. [*] All regular skills trainable. [*] Construction allows you to build and visit player-owned houses. [*] Hunter allows you to catch implings which can be sold for Coins. [*] Enhancement items - Cooking gauntlets, Runecrafting pouches, Crystal saw, Gloves of silence, Boots of lightness, Golden Hammer & Golden Tinderbox. [*] 4 Quests which vary in difficulty. [*] 3 Achievement Diaries which vary in difficulty. [*] Maxed cape - Achieve all 99s to obtain this cape. [*] Quests cape - Complete all of the Quests to obtain this cape. [*] Achievements cape - Complete all of the Achievement Diaries to obtain this cape. [*] Clue scrolls - Monsters and bosses drop these, solve them to have a chance of being rewarded with rare items. [*] Castle Wars - Capture the flag Minigame. [*] Fun PK - A PVP Minigame that's safe and rewards you with PK Points. [*] Lottery - Buy a ticket to have a chance of winning the Lottery. [*] Skilling Isle - A unique Skilling Zone. [*] Skill Guides - Click on a Skill to open up the Guide interface. [*] Random Events - Prison, Pickaxes & Axes break. [*] Amulet of glory charging. [*] God books - Able to fill each God book with the correct God pages. [*] Birds nests. [*] PK Points system. [*] Zarvality Points system. [*] Voting system. [*] Automatic donation system. [*] Donator Zone. [*] Competitive Hiscores. [*] 24/7. [*] 474 Server with exceptions of a couple of items. [*] Economy. [*] Resizable and fixed screen options. [*] Clean and professional.[/ul]
[CENTER][B][U][SIZE=3]Videos & Images:[/SIZE][/U][/B]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qpBYeLStli0
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/1yofbq.jpg[/img]

item.title: Zarvality - Instant Pking | All Skills | Construction | Achievements | Quests
item.dc:creator: @Zarvality Zarvality
item.description:
@Zarvality wrote:

[CENTER]

[B][U][SIZE=3][URL=http://www.zarvality.com]Join Now![/URL][/SIZE][/U][/B][/CENTER]

[B][U][SIZE=3]Introduction:[/SIZE][/U][/B]

Zarvality is a Runescape Private Server that inspires a variety of people to play due to the daily updates, exciting content and friendly staff team. Players of all different ages and backgrounds have the opportunity to fit in nicely with the community and help Zarvality reach the very top.

[B][U][SIZE=3]Social Media Links:[/U][/B]

[URL=http://www.facebook.com/zarvality] Facebook[/URL]
[URL=http://www.twitter.com/zarvality] Twitter[/URL][/SIZE][/U][/B]

[B][U][SIZE=3]Our Best Features:[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[ul][] Choose XP Rates - On login, you’re able to choose a ranking. The Pker ranking allows you to set any combat skills to your desired level. Alternatively, you can choose Hard, Medium or Easy XP rates.
[] Instant Pking - As mentioned above, you’re able to set your ranking to a Pker. This allows you to PK quickly due to the set leveling.
[] All regular skills trainable.
[] Construction allows you to build and visit player-owned houses.
[] Hunter allows you to catch implings which can be sold for Coins.
[] Enhancement items - Cooking gauntlets, Runecrafting pouches, Crystal saw, Gloves of silence, Boots of lightness, Golden Hammer & Golden Tinderbox.
[] 4 Quests which vary in difficulty.
[] 3 Achievement Diaries which vary in difficulty.
[] Maxed cape - Achieve all 99s to obtain this cape.
[] Quests cape - Complete all of the Quests to obtain this cape.
[] Achievements cape - Complete all of the Achievement Diaries to obtain this cape.
[] Clue scrolls - Monsters and bosses drop these, solve them to have a chance of being rewarded with rare items.
[] Castle Wars - Capture the flag Minigame.
[] Fun PK - A PVP Minigame that’s safe and rewards you with PK Points.
[] Lottery - Buy a ticket to have a chance of winning the Lottery.
[] Skilling Isle - A unique Skilling Zone.
[] Skill Guides - Click on a Skill to open up the Guide interface.
[] Random Events - Prison, Pickaxes & Axes break.
[] Amulet of glory charging.
[] God books - Able to fill each God book with the correct God pages.
[] Birds nests.
[] PK Points system.
[] Zarvality Points system.
[] Voting system.
[] Automatic donation system.
[] Donator Zone.
[] Competitive Hiscores.
[] 24/7.
[] 474 Server with exceptions of a couple of items.
[] Economy.
[] Resizable and fixed screen options.
[] Clean and professional.[/ul]
